Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.game

Class leaderboard

java.lang.Object
com.example.game.leaderboard
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class leaderboard extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Author:
Ze Tay leaderboard.java Responsible for the whole score button's page from the index page. Will be showing top 3 of each board and also top players accordingly to searched result and filters.

    • getScore

      private void getScore()
      Read all records recorded in the text file, save it into Scoring Object, sort it, and add it into the table

    • searchAction

      void searchAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Search function to let user search accordingly to specific filter( tiles, level, username, score, etc). Clear the previous ScoringObject. Add records that met the "search" input into the table.
      Parameters:
      event - get search term from search bar and clear the list and return the result

    • filterBoard

      private void filterBoard(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Filter the table to show respective score accordingly to the board size (3x3, 4x4, etc)
      Parameters:
      event - Filter the table using the board size

    • sort

      public static void sort(ArrayList<Scoring> arr)
      Selection Sort algorithm, sort the ScoringObject by using Scoring.getScore()
      Parameters:
      arr - input Scoring arraylist and score by the score

    • podium

      void podium(String board)
      Sort the top 3 user of respective board size and display the record's username and score into two respective disabled text-field.
      Parameters:
      board - show top 3 score for each board

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initialize the data and set to respective text field and table. getScore() will be run here.

      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
